// Pivot 0, 0
int CLL_4[22] = {
	2, 7,
	8, 2,
	16, 2,
	21, 8,
	21, 36,
	16, 42,
	8, 42,
	2, 36,
	2, 7,
	2, 7
	
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
